title: Crypto among sectors ‘debanked’ by 9 major banks: US regulator
contentSnippet: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency said crypto was one of many industries that banks had denied services to, and it could refer its findings to the Justice Department.

title: ストラテジー社、ビットコイン保有企業の扱いめぐり書簡　MSCI指数除外案に反対表明
contentSnippet: ビットコインを蓄積するストラテジー社がMSCIの指数除外案に反対意見を提出。仮想通貨保有50%以上の企業を除外する提案に対して、様々な観点から異論を唱えている。

title: 上場企業がソラナ・ETH上で直接株式発行　Superstate新サービスを予定
contentSnippet: Superstateは、株式をトークン化する新サービスを発表。上場企業が仮想通貨イーサリアムやソラナのブロックチェーン上で株式を新たにトークン化して、投資家に直接発行することができる。

title: Survey finds 6 in 10 of Asia’s rich plan to ramp up crypto buying
contentSnippet: Sygnum’s APAC HNWI Report 2025 found that 87% of Asia’s high-net-worth individuals are already exposed to crypto, with an average allocation of approximately 17%.

title: Bitcoin Exchange Paxful Agrees to Plead Guilty, Hit With $7.5 Million in Penalties
contentSnippet: Authorities say Paxful was used by money launderers and other criminals—and that the Bitcoin exchange knew about it.

title: Official Trump Crypto Game Revealed With $1 Million in Solana Meme Coin Rewards
contentSnippet: Trump Billionaires Club on iOS and Android will launch by year's end and offer $1 million worth of the president's meme coin as rewards.

title: ビットコインの買い増しなどを計画　米Strive、最大約780億円を調達へ
contentSnippet: 米Striveは、最大約780億円相当の株式を発行・販売する契約を締結。調達資金は仮想通貨ビットコインの買い増しやビットコイン関連商品への投資などに使用すると説明した。

title: State Street and Galaxy to Launch Tokenized Liquidity Fund on Solana in 2026
contentSnippet: The fund will run on Solana at launch and use PYUSD.

title: Crypto CEOs Join U.S. CFTC's Innovation Council to Steer Market Developments
contentSnippet: The chief executives of firms such as Gemini and Kraken will pitch in on U.S. policy efforts through the council's future, public discussions.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves Bitcoin Ahead of Potential Record IPO
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's private aerospace company SpaceX moved more of its Bitcoin holdings on Wednesday ahead of reported blockbuster IPO plans.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Crypto Debanking and Efforts to 'Weaponize Finance' Must End, Says Top US Banking Regulator
contentSnippet: Major U.S. banks denied services to crypto and other lawful businesses based on industry rather than risk, an OCC preliminary report finds.

title: Fed slashes interest rates, but issues mixed forward guidance
contentSnippet: A lack of clarity on future interest rate cuts under Jerome Powell's leadership has placed a damper on a Bitcoin price rally, analysts say.

title: Fed rate cut may pump stocks but Bitcoin options call sub-$100K in January
contentSnippet: Federal Reserve monetary policy could benefit stocks, but BTC options show the short-term odds of Bitcoin rallying to $100,000 remain slim.

title: Stripe Acqui-Hires Crypto Payments Startup Valora, Venturing Further Into Stablecoins
contentSnippet: The team behind the Celo-based app is joining Stripe, while the intellectual property is returned to cLabs.

title: Tether Pivots to Wellness Apps and Robotics in Latest Step Away from Crypto
contentSnippet: The stablecoin giant is using its cash surplus to fund a disparate string of side ventures, from humanoid robots to calorie-counting AI.

title: Pantera, Coinbase back Surf’s $15M push to build crypto-native AI models
contentSnippet: The funding will support Surf’s next AI model aimed at delivering deeper onchain analysis and automating research for crypto companies and traders.

title: A Startup Is Trying to Take the Twitter Name From Elon Musk by Force—And It Might Work
contentSnippet: Operation Bluebird, led by Twitter's former trademark lawyer, filed to cancel X Corp's Twitter trademarks after Musk abandoned the brand. Will Musk spend millions defending a name he deliberately kill

title: U.S. Banking Regulator Warns Wall Street on 'Debanking,' Claims Practices 'Unlawful'
contentSnippet: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency probed debanking of certain industries, including digital assets, and said it'll pursue any repeat of such activity.

title: GameStop Q3 earnings miss estimates, pressured by soft sales and lower BTC gains
contentSnippet: Falling sales and diminished Bitcoin gains pressured earnings, with the stock continuing to retrace its brief rally in March.

title: 'National Security' at Risk If MSCI Excludes Crypto Treasuries, Warns Bitcoin Giant Strategy
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury leader Strategy argued to MSCI that excluding a crypto-buying firms from its indices would hurt America’s national security.

title: Tether launches privacy-focused health platform with on-device AI
contentSnippet: Tether says the system is designed to give users control over biometric data by keeping analysis and storage off the cloud.

title: Bitcoin Swings Wildly as Fed's Powell Straddles Labor Market and Inflation Issues
contentSnippet: "Powell is threading the needle between their two mandates," said one analyst.

title: ChronoForge to shut down amid funding collapse and Web3 gaming turmoil
contentSnippet: ChronoForge’s shutdown highlights mounting financial strain across Web3 gaming as shrinking budgets and dismal market sentiment take their toll.

title: GameStop Stock Falls After Bitcoin Holdings Lose Value, Firm Says It Could Sell BTC
contentSnippet: Markets haven’t reacted well to GameStop’s latest earnings call, where it revealed sinking Bitcoin value and retail sales alike.

title: A16z Crypto to Open Seoul Office, Hire Sungmo Park to Lead Asia Efforts
contentSnippet: Andreessen Horowitz's crypto venture capital unit pointed to high levels of crypto ownership in South Korea and Singapore, and growing onchain activity in Japan.

title: Consumer Groups Join Unions Trying to Derail U.S. Crypto Market Structure Bill
contentSnippet: Political progressives have joined forces to oppose current versions of the industry-backed legislative effort in the Senate.

title: Conflicted Fed cuts rates but Bitcoin’s ‘fragile range’ pins BTC under $100K
contentSnippet: A divided Federal Reserve approved a 0.25% rate cut, but concerns over inflation and growth, as well as Glassnode data highlighting BTC’s “fragile range,” may keep it under $100,000.

title: Paxful Pleads Guilty to Aiding Crime, Ignoring AML Laws
contentSnippet: The DOJ said the firm knowingly facilitated illicit trades tied to sex work, sanctions evasion, and fraud, earning millions in fees while ignoring U.S. law.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Waver as Fed Delivers Third Rate Cut
contentSnippet: The central bank’s move was widely expected, with the Federal Reserve announcing the third rate cut for 2025.

title: Federal Reserve Cuts Rates 25 Basis Points, With Two Members Voting for Steady Policy
contentSnippet: The anticipated move comes as policymakers are still operating without several key economic data releases that remain delayed or suspended due to the U.S. government shutdown.

title: Elon Musk Says DOGE Flagged Billions in Federal 'Zombie Payments'
contentSnippet: In a new interview, Musk detailed how the short-lived government efficiency effort identified improper federal spending and drew political pushback.

title: The Protocol: Stripe’s Tempo Testnet Goes Live
contentSnippet: Also: ZKSync Lite to Sunset, Blockstream App Update, Axelar’s AgentFlux

title: JPYC株式会社、次世代金融カンファレンスMoneyX 2026の企画・運営として参画決定
contentSnippet: JPYC株式会社が、2026年2月27日に東京都内で開催される次世代金融カンファレンス「MoneyX」に共催企業として参画。ステーブルコインやデジタル証券など「通貨の進化と社会実装」をテーマに、産官学のリーダーが議論を行う。

title: 仮想通貨のインサイダー規制導入、市場成熟へ　IEO投資上限も提案｜金融審議会
contentSnippet: 2025年12月10日公表の最新の金融審議会報告書で暗号資産（仮想通貨）が金商法の規制対象になることが明記された。IEO投資上限のほか、コード監査義務化、インサイダー取引規制など投資家保護を抜本強化する。交換業者への影響と今後の展望を詳解

title: シルクロード関連ウォレット、10年ぶりに突如活動　4.7億円相当ビットコインを送金
contentSnippet: 10年以上休眠していたシルクロード関連の仮想通貨ウォレット約312個が突如活動を再開し、約4.7億円相当のビットコインを送金。今年は5月にも大規模な移動が確認されている。米政府は押収資産を戦略準備金として保有する方針を示すも、売却疑惑も浮上。

title: SEC委員長、2026年に仮想通貨規制の大幅進展を予告　トークン分類制度など導入加速
contentSnippet: SEC委員長が2026年の仮想通貨規制大幅進展を予告。トークン分類制度で3カテゴリーを非証券化、1月にイノベーション免除導入へ。前政権の法執行重視から明確なルール制定へ転換。

title: 著名投資家レイ・ダリオ「中東は資本家のシリコンバレー」：国家によるAI・デジタル資産戦略を絶賛
contentSnippet: 著名投資家レイ・ダリオ氏がAIのハブとして急速に成長する中東を高く評価し、「資本家のためのシリコンバレーになりつつある」と述べた。一方、マイケル・セイラー氏は中東がビットコイン担保型デジタル銀行システムによって「21世紀のスイス」になる可能性を指摘した。

title: 「ビットコイン・アフターダークETF」申請　夜間取引時間の高パフォーマンスに着目
contentSnippet: ニコラス・ウェルスが米国夜間取引時間のみ仮想通貨ビットコインを保有する新たなETFを申請した。夜間の高リターン傾向に注目したものだ。ヘッジ型ETFも同時申請した。

title: プライバシー重視のステーブルコイン「USDCx」、Aleoのテストネットでローンチ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨のステーブルコインUSDCを発行するサークルは、プライバシー機能を持つL1ブロックチェーンAleoのテストネットでUSDCxがローンチされたことを発表。ユースケースなどを説明した。
